original_text:
for the evildoer has no future hope,
    and the lamp of the wicked will be snuffed out.
korean_text: 대저 행악자는 장래가 없겠고 악인의 등불은 꺼지리라

sentences.original_text: for evildoer has no future hope
sentences.korean_translation: 악행하는 자는 미래에 대한 희망이 없으니

sentences.original_text: and lamp of the wicked will be snuffed out
